description: Export paddle inference model or onnx model.([PretrainedModel] (model) – The model to export.input_spec (paddle.static.InputSpec, optional) – Describes the input of the saved model’s forward method, which can be describedby InputSpec or example Tensor.  Default None.path (Optional[str], optional) – Output dir to save the exported model. Defaults to None.model_format (Optional[str], optional) – Export model format. There are two options: paddle or onnx, defaults to paddle.

params.name: input_spec
params.description: Describes the input of the saved models forward method, which can be describedby InputSpec or example Tensor.  Default None.

params.name: path
params.description: Output dir to save the exported model. Defaults to None.

params.name: model_format
params.description: Export model format. There are two options: paddle or onnx, defaults to paddle.
